destroyer_patrol.name: Destroyer Patrol
destroyer_patrol.description: Enemy destroyers have been detected. We need a skilled pilot to eliminate them.
destroyer_patrol.briefing: These destroyer-class vessels pose a significant threat. Engage with caution.

drone_hive_assault.name: Drone Hive Assault
drone_hive_assault.description: A rogue drone hive has been discovered. Destroy the Mother drone to collapse the hive.
drone_hive_assault.briefing: The Mother drone coordinates the entire hive. Once destroyed, the others should scatter.

battlecruiser_ambush.name: Battlecruiser Ambush
battlecruiser_ambush.description: Intelligence reports a Serpentis battlecruiser group in the area. Eliminate them before they can raid our convoys.
battlecruiser_ambush.briefing: Battlecruisers are heavily armed and armored. You'll need a well-fitted ship and good tactics to succeed.

blood_raiders_stronghold.name: Blood Raiders Stronghold
blood_raiders_stronghold.description: Blood Raiders have established a forward operating base. Clear it out.
blood_raiders_stronghold.briefing: Watch out for their energy neutralizers. Bring plenty of cap boosters.

angel_cartel_raid.name: Angel Cartel Raid
angel_cartel_raid.description: Angel Cartel forces are massing for a raid. Stop them before they can launch their attack.
angel_cartel_raid.briefing: These are veteran pirates. They're fast and hit hard. Don't underestimate them.

guristas_command_ship.name: Guristas Command Ship
guristas_command_ship.description: We've located a Guristas command battlecruiser coordinating attacks in the region. Take it down.
guristas_command_ship.briefing: The command ship will be protected by escort vessels. Clear the escorts first or you'll be overwhelmed.

sansha_invasion_force.name: Sansha's Invasion Force
sansha_invasion_force.description: Sansha's Nation is probing our borders with a major force. Repel them.
sansha_invasion_force.briefing: Sansha ships use sophisticated EWAR. Be prepared for tracking disruption and energy neutralization.
